'''''The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: Siege of Gondor''''' is a supplement for [[Games Workshop]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game]]''.

The supplement was discussed in the magazine ''[[White Dwarf]]'', issue 291.
